item.title: My Reading List
item.description: Currently Reading Coming Soon. Engineering Books Computer Networks: A Systems Approach (The Morgan Kaufmann Series in Networking) | Online/Free Copy - It explores the key principles of computer networking, using real world examples from network and protocol design. Software-Defined Networks: A Systems Approach | Online/Free Copy - Software-Defined Networks (SDN) are transforming the Internet by replacing bundled, proprietary hardware and control software. SDN is being embraced by cloud providers, telcos, and enterprises, as it enables a new era of innovation in networking.
